Ctrl K

Search...

Navigation

Canned Responses

List all Canned Responses in an Account

GET

/

api

/

v1

/

accounts

/

{account\_id}

/

canned\_responses

Try it

cURL

Python

JavaScript

PHP

Go

Java

Copy

```
curl --request GET \
  --url https://app.chatwoot.com/api/v1/accounts/{account_id}/canned_responses \
  --header 'api_access_token: <api-key>'
```

200

403

Copy

```
[\
  {\
    "id": 123,\
    "account_id": 123,\
    "short_code": "<string>",\
    "content": "<string>",\
    "created_at": "<string>",\
    "updated_at": "<string>"\
  }\
]
```

#### Authorizations

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/canned-responses/list-all-canned-responses-in-an-account#authorization-api-access-token)

api\_access\_token

string

header

required

This token can be obtained by visiting the profile page or via rails console. Provides access to endpoints based on the user permissions levels. This token can be saved by an external system when user is created via API, to perform activities on behalf of the user.

#### Path Parameters

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/canned-responses/list-all-canned-responses-in-an-account#parameter-account-id)

account\_id

integer

required

The numeric ID of the account

#### Response

200

200403

application/json

Success

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/canned-responses/list-all-canned-responses-in-an-account#response-id)

id

integer

ID of the canned response

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/canned-responses/list-all-canned-responses-in-an-account#response-account-id)

account\_id

integer

Account Id

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/canned-responses/list-all-canned-responses-in-an-account#response-short-code)

short\_code

string

Short Code for quick access of the canned response

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/canned-responses/list-all-canned-responses-in-an-account#response-content)

content

string

Message content for canned response

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/canned-responses/list-all-canned-responses-in-an-account#response-created-at)

created\_at

string

The date and time when the canned response was created

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/canned-responses/list-all-canned-responses-in-an-account#response-updated-at)

updated\_at

string

The date and time when the canned response was updated

Assistant

Responses are generated using AI and may contain mistakes.
